alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 5:52PM AKST until January 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulation of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions will persist across Saint George Island where falling light snow will combine with strong northeast winds to reduce visibility to a half mile or less at times. Areas of blowing snow will persist for Saint Paul Island, but visibilities will remain higher with little to no new snowfall expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
